duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze and implement enterprise data governance under data quality projects, with a focus on regulatory reporting and KYC screening.
Develop data quality rules and strategies, working with data lakes and analytics data.
Collaborate with a team of eight members to expand and enhance data governance and data quality initiatives.
Utilize tools such as Collibra, Jira, and Confluence to drive data quality and governance activities.
Participate in testing and analysis to ensure the effectiveness of data quality processes and models.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Data Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
